title: Victory in Europe, 75 years later
caption: Victory in Europe, 75 years later
desc: On 8 May 1945, thousands of people poured onto the streets of Paris, as they did in London, to celebrate the defeat of Nazi Germany and the end of World War Two in Europe. This view of the famous Champs-Élysées was taken on top of the Arc de Triomphe, looking east toward the distant Place de la Concorde and the Louvre. Victory in Europe (VE Day) had come at last.
copyright: Crowds on the Champs-Élysées on 8 May 1945, Paris, France (© AFP via Getty Images)
